results.title: Provokable left ventricular outflow tract obstruction in a patient without hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: MANAGEMENT: Pharmacological therapy (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 50 mg daily, @CHEMICAL_Disopyramide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004206 @@@disopyramide@@@ 250 mg twice daily), dual-chamber pacemaker implantation.

citations.NLM: Pasquale F, Tomé-Esteban MT, Morgagni R, Elliott P. Provokable left ventricular outflow tract obstruction in a patient without hypertrophy. Nat Rev Cardiol. 2009 Apr;6(4):313-6. PMID: 19352335

results.title: The Systolic Hypertension in the Elderly Program (SHEP): an intervention trial on isolated systolic hypertension. SHEP Cooperative Research Group.
results.text_hl: Also, the mean age was 71.6 years; the mean SBP was 170.3 mmHg and the mean DBP was 76.6 mmHg; 59.8% had codeable resting @<m>DISEASE_Ciuffo_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566733 @@@electrocardiographic abnormalities@@@.
